info.title: Advanced Porn Nudity and adult-content detection
info.description:
Advanced porn and Nudity detection from submitted image Urls. Find if the skin tone present in the image is high than a normal level. Also detect if the url contains a bad keyword in it.

Keywords: nude, nudity detection, nudity recognition, nudity filter, porn detection, porn filter, image protection, image analysis, image detection,adult filter,bad image,kids protection.

get.description: Find the nudity rate by analysing the skin tone and bad words.
